name: utl_reorg : Oracle Tablespace Reorg Tool
short_description: utl_reorg will be a project for an offline reorg tool for all content of a tablespace of an Oracle Server. Base version will be Oracle 9i R2; The intention is to create an easy to use Utility for the DBA and to implement high quality Code with PL/SQL.
